title: Mormyshi
data: Mormyshi (Russian: Мормыши) is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Mormyshansky Selsoviet, Romanovsky District, Altai Krai, Russia. The population was 149 as of 2013.[2] There is 1 street. Mormyshi is located on the Gorkoye Lake,[3] 29 kilometers (18 mi) south of Romanovo (the district's administrative centre) by road. Buranovka is the nearest rural locality.[4] This Romanovsky District, Altai Krai location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
